mapper.select: SELECT * FROM daily_top_info WHERE id = (SELECT max(id) FROM daily_top_info) UNION ALL SELECT * FROM weekly_top_info WHERE id >= #{id}
SELECT * FROM movie_info WHERE movie_id in (${ids}) ORDER BY instr(${ids2}, movie_id)
SELECT * FROM movie_info WHERE open_dt > #{openDt} AND NOT open_dt = 'nan' AND NOT poster_url = 'nan' ORDER BY open_dt ASC
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM movie_info WHERE open_dt <= '${date}' AND NOT poster_url = 'nan' AND nations LIKE '한국' ORDER BY open_dt DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 100
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM movie_info WHERE open_dt <= '${date}' AND NOT poster_url = 'nan' AND NOT nations LIKE '한국' ORDER BY open_dt DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 100
SELECT AVG(review_score) AS grade_avg FROM movie_review WHERE movie_id=#{movieId} GROUP BY movie_id
SELECT COUNT(id) from movie_review where id=#{id} AND NOT review_score=0
